overview:
Continental Real Estate Group not only provides real estate listing services but are also good enough to guide you in selling process. Majority of property owners would like to sell their property in quick time and flat fee broker Continental Real Estate Group helps in this with list on MLS. Every property seller would like to save money and flat fee broker helps the best way by placing their real estate listing in MLS which we also know by Multiple Listing Service. List on MLS has grown in popularity among most of the home owners either they are looking to sell or buy or event rent their property.

If we look at savings one can make with list on MLS is uncountable and is growing with listing with Continental Real Estate Group. When you get in touch with this flat fee broker to list on MLS you will realize the savings you will make. From the first step right from real estate listing you start making good amount of savings when you list on MLS.

For your real estate listing on MLS Continental Real Estate Group charges you a very small upfront fee which is one time depending on the time period you want this list on MLS. You might be charged a flat fee of $349 for a specified period of time you opt for your real estate listing. For more info on real estate listing services provided by Continental Real Estate Group you can visit their website www.listflatfeeonmls.com , www.listonmlsbyowner.com , www.listmyhomeinmls.com .
